capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has an affiliation with the Hogvy organization. That's really interesting, isn't it? It makes sense that someone like Filch, who's always so keen on following rules and maintaining order, would be associated with a group that values discipline and structure.

I'm not really sure what to make of the fact that Hoggy's been affiliated with Filch, to be honest. I mean, it seems like a pretty unlikely pairing - Filch is always so strict and by-the-book, while Hoggy's more of a free spirit. But hey, I guess you never really know what goes on behind closed doors at Hogwarts, right?
